name: VR XRacer Pro: Racing VR games
name_original: VR XRacer Pro: Racing VR games
description:
VR X-racer is VR version of X-Racer having 2 modes (hand mode and virtual reality mode). This simple yet addictive game has reached the number of 5 million players worldwide. It was selected as Top 10 Best Virtual Reality Games 2016 by Trickolla.com and received thousands of compliments worldwide:
“VR X-Racer a fun loving addictive game” – Top Best Free Apps.
“World-class Universal Racing Game” – Aoneapps.
“Outstanding racing game for crazy game lovers” “ a time killer” - androidauthority.com
“ An entertaining game that could easily become addictive” – the appsreview.com
And many more…

FEATURE
Multicolor themes
Graphics quality is quite superb
Virtual reality (VR) and hand mode
Increasing Difficulty- Endless Race
Stunning 3D visuals effects
Collect credits and purchase spaceships

STORY

In this game, we will be in star war 3, when UFO spaceship attack our Earth, we step up on a jet, bring missiles like in battle Los Angeles, fly up, and join the right side to protect what belongs to us.

The airway is very difficult and dangerous. You need to avoid many obstacles around. Be careful, if you are playing VR mode, you could fall down to ground.

That's incredible when you play VR Racing game with a VR Glass of Samsung Galaxy S7. Very awesome!

Enjoy the game for brave xracer!


This game VR X:Racer is well compatible for all mobile devices. The most Unlimited VR Racing game ever, try hard and feeling rush!
